_header: Lord as Thou hang upon the Rood
_description: A prayer to staunch blood — eight lines

RylandsLat228.First Lines:
Lord as thou hange vpon þe rodeIn al thy sore [ ] staunche
                        this n blodethe fadir & the son & the holy
                    gastestaunch this n blode some in hast…
RylandsLat228.Last Lines:
…Staunch this n blode styll to standein goddes
                    name
RylandsLat228.Note: Followed by no. of prayers to be said.
